item.title: BABA
item.description: score:1083 Chances: Alibaba Cloud releases open-source large language models (LLMs) to expand its influence in generative artificial intelligence. Paytm founder Vijay Shekhar Sharma to acquire a 10.3% stake in Ant Group from Alibaba, becoming the company’s largest shareholder. Alibaba introduces licensing requirement for businesses with over 100 million monthly active users to access its large language models (LLMs).
